item.title: Turni pulizie
item.description: Concepito una mattina noiosa, crea turni di pulizia a due a due partendo da una lista di persone. python import random as rd import datetime as dt people = ['Angelo', 'Paolo', 'Matteo', 'Gaetano', 'Michele'] rd.shuffle(people) #print('Random Order:', people) couples = [(people[i], people[i+1]) for i in range(len(people)-1)] couples.append((people[-1], people[0])) #print('Couples:', couples) today = dt.datetime.now() #print('Today is the:', today.strftime('%x')) for j in range(len(couples)): nextwk = today + dt.timedelta(days=7*(j+1)) print('Week:', j+1, nextwk.strftime('%x')) print('Couple:', couples[j], '\n')
